00073 #define FCPU 11059200ul //!< The frequency of CPU crystal

00076 #define EN 2
00077 #define lcd_port PORTC  //!< PORT to which LCD is connected
00078 
00079 #define sbit(reg,bit)   reg |= (1<<bit)                 //!<  to set a certain bit of given register. 
00080 #define cbit(reg,bit)   reg &= ~(1<<bit)                //!<  to reset a certain bit of given register.

00102 void lcd_port_config (void)
00103 {
00104  DDRC = DDRC | 0xF7; //all the LCD pin's direction set as output
00105  PORTC = PORTC & 0x80; // all the LCD pins are set to logic 0 except PORTC 7
00106 }

00111  void lcd_set_4bit()
00112 {
00113         _delay_ms(1);
00114 
00115         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00116         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00117         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00118         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00119         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00120         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00121 
00122         _delay_ms(1);
00123 
00124         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00125         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00126         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00127         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00128         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00129         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00130 
00131         _delay_ms(1);
00132 
00133         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00134         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00135         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00136         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00137         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00138         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00139 
00140         _delay_ms(1);
00141 
00142         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00143         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00144         lcd_port = 0x20;                                //Sending 2 to initialise LCD 4-bit mode
00145         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00146         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00147         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00148 
00149         
00150 }

00155  void lcd_init()
00156 {
00157         _delay_ms(1);
00158 
00159         lcd_wr_command(0x28);                   //LCD 4-bit mode and 2 lines.
00160         lcd_wr_command(0x01);
00161         lcd_wr_command(0x06);
00162         lcd_wr_command(0x0E);
00163         lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00164                 
00165 }

00170  void lcd_wr_command(unsigned char cmd)
00171 {
00172         unsigned char temp;
00173         temp = cmd;
00174         temp = temp & 0xF0;
00175         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00176         lcd_port |= temp;
00177         cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00178         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00179         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00180         _delay_ms(5);
00181         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00182         
00183         cmd = cmd & 0x0F;
00184         cmd = cmd<<4;
00185         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00186         lcd_port |= cmd;
00187         cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00188         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00189         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00190         _delay_ms(5);
00191         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00192 }
00193 
00197 void lcd_wr_char(char letter)
00198 {
00199         char temp;
00200         temp = letter;
00201         temp = (temp & 0xF0);
00202         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00203         lcd_port |= temp;
00204         sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00205         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00206         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00207         _delay_ms(5);
00208         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00209 
00210         letter = letter & 0x0F;
00211         letter = letter<<4;
00212         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00213         lcd_port |= letter;
00214         sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00215         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00216         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00217         _delay_ms(5);
00218         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00219 }

00225 void lcd_home()
00226 {
00227         lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00228 }

00230 
00234 void lcd_string(char *str)
00235 {
00236         while(*str != '\0')
00237         {
00238                 lcd_wr_char(*str);
00239                 str++;
00240         }
00241 }
00242 
00249 void lcd_cursor (char row, char column)
00250 {
00251         switch (row) {
00252                 case 1: lcd_wr_command (0x80 + column - 1); break;
00253                 case 2: lcd_wr_command (0xc0 + column - 1); break;
00254                 case 3: lcd_wr_command (0x94 + column - 1); break;
00255                 case 4: lcd_wr_command (0xd4 + column - 1); break;
00256                 default: break;
00257         }
00258 }
00259 
00268 void lcd_print (char row, char coloumn, unsigned int value, int digits)
00269 {
00270         unsigned char flag=0;
00271         if(row==0||coloumn==0)
00272         {
00273                 lcd_home();
00274         }
00275         else
00276         {
00277                 lcd_cursor(row,coloumn);
00278         }
00279         if(digits==5 || flag==1)
00280         {
00281                 million=value/10000+48;
00282                 lcd_wr_char(million);
00283                 flag=1;
00284         }
00285         if(digits==4 || flag==1)
00286         {
00287                 temp = value/1000;
00288                 thousand = temp%10 + 48;
00289                 lcd_wr_char(thousand);
00290                 flag=1;
00291         }
00292         if(digits==3 || flag==1)
00293         {
00294                 temp = value/100;
00295                 hundred = temp%10 + 48;
00296                 lcd_wr_char(hundred);
00297                 flag=1;
00298         }
00299         if(digits==2 || flag==1)
00300         {
00301                 temp = value/10;
00302                 tens = temp%10 + 48;
00303                 lcd_wr_char(tens);
00304                 flag=1;
00305         }
00306         if(digits==1 || flag==1)
00307         {
00308                 unit = value%10 + 48;
00309                 lcd_wr_char(unit);
00310         }
00311         if(digits>5)
00312         {
00313                 lcd_wr_char('E');
00314         }
00315         
00316 }
